sentence.spanish: La manzana roja se ve deliciosa.

sentence.english: The sky is very blue today.
sentence.spanish: El cielo está muy azul hoy.

sentence.english: The grass is always greener on the other side.
sentence.spanish: La hierba es siempre más verde en el patio del vecino.

sentence.english: She wore a bright yellow dress to the party.
sentence.spanish: Ella llevó un vestido amarillo brillante a la fiesta.

sentence.english: I drank a glass of fresh orange juice.
sentence.spanish: Me bebí un vaso de zumo de naranja fresco.

sentence.english: The royal robes were a deep purple.
sentence.spanish: Las vestiduras reales eran de un morado intenso.

sentence.english: Her little girl's room was painted pink.
sentence.spanish: La habitación de su niña estaba pintada de rosa.

sentence.english: The package was wrapped in brown paper.
sentence.spanish: El paquete estaba envuelto en papel marrón.

sentence.english: He prefers to wear a black suit.
sentence.spanish: Él prefiere llevar un traje negro.
La nieve era de un blanco puro.

sentence.english: The sky turned gray before the storm.
sentence.spanish: El cielo se volvió gris antes de la tormenta.
